name: Emoji Invasion
description:
Emoji have invaded the galaxy! Blast your way through all your favourite emojis and bring peace to the universe in this action packed space shooter game.

‣ Complete missions, get rewards, upgrade your ships!
‣ Varying levels and types of emoji as you progress, can you find them all?
‣ Compete in global leaderboards across a range of challenges
‣ Upgrade your ship with homing rockets, lasers and more
‣ Difficult boss emoji to defeat
‣ Collect power-ups to help in your battle through the cosmos
‣ Fill your boost gauge and fly right through enemies at crazy speeds

Compete against friends to see who can fly the furthest or defeat the most emoji invaders!

Emoji Invasion is a free to play arcade shooter with a retro vibe, largely inspired by oldschool space shoot 'em up games.
